Tutorial4-How to use CLI - Command line Interface

why:
 - easier
 - faster
 - memory management (efficient)
 - CI/CD

Step1: start Jenkins
Step2: Go to Manage Jenkins --> Configure Security --> select "Anyone can do anything"
Step3: go to --> http://localhost:8080/cli/ OR Go to Manage Jenkins --> Jenkins CLI
Step4: download jenkins-cli jar. Place at any location
Step5: Test the jenkins command line is working
Step6: 

Tips:
	- cd /Users/winnie/tools/jenkins-cli
	- chmod 755 jenkins-cli.jar
	- java -jar jenkins-cli.jar -s http://localhost:8080/ -webSocket help
